title: An essay on the superiority of Durin lifestyle
description: It has come to the attention of this writer that many do not understand why the Durin's lifestyle is far superior to our own. I shall account the details so that we all may follow in their example and better understand how to care for the Durins aboard the landship....

title: A collection of musings
description: Clouds ranged as billows, distant-run roads withered. I, departed of the vistas, sailed a ferry in late autumn.

title: Texas
description: Texas, Texas, Texas, she can't keep me away forever! T-E-X-A-S! I asked the doctor to put you on my team, or be the leader of it, for the next mission! Maybe we can share a milliefoglie! Muhahaha!
